name: Shafat Ahamed
shortBio: Managing HR operations, administrative coordination, and accounts activities to ensure smooth and efficient day-to-day business performance. I support recruitment and employee management, oversee administrative processes and expense tracking, and maintain financial documentation while collaborating across departments to enhance workflow and productivity.
professionalSkillsBio: Skilled in payroll management, HR operations administration, and recruitment execution with a strong focus on compliance, accuracy, and process efficiency.
workExperienceSummary: Background in manufacturing, wellness, and HR service industries in Bangladesh. Expert in Bangladesh Labour Act 2006 compliance, high-volume recruitment, grievance handling, and ERP-based payroll systems.

name: Md Arifujjaman
shortBio: I am a creative graphic designer specializing in logos, banners, social media posts, and branding. I turn ideas into visually appealing designs and ensure every project is unique, professional, and impactful for clients.
professionalSkillsBio: I focus on creativity, attention to detail, and meeting deadlines to ensure client satisfaction. I have worked with various clients to deliver visually appealing and professional designs that effectively communicate their brand message.
workExperienceSummary: I am a creative graphic designer with experience in designing logos, social media content, banners, and branding materials. I have worked with various clients to deliver impactful designs.

name: Harun Or Roshid
shortBio: I am a results-driven Digital Marketing Strategist & Web Developer. I plan and execute data-driven marketing campaigns to improve brand visibility and business growth.
professionalSkillsBio: I specialise in content strategy, performance analysis, and AI-powered marketing solutions. I am passionate about leveraging digital tools and analytics to deliver measurable results and long-term success for organisations.
workExperienceSummary: I have over 2+ years of experience in digital marketing, working with educational institutions, a Nationwide ISP, and training-based organisations. I have managed paid campaigns for Sonargaon University, National Institute of Engineering and Technology, and GlobalEd, along with other growing brands. My expertise includes Meta and Google Ads, SEO, content writing, and WordPress website development.
